resources.string: Error: needed updated YouTube App or %s

Before starting your registration for Title Defense of current semester, check if you have all the necessary information. The required information for successful registration you will need:

● Your team information (Team members ID, name, DIU email address, Phone Number)
● Your tentative title
● Your preferred choice (Development Project/ Research Project/ Internship)
● Your preferred area of interest (In development projects: Android, iOS Mobile Application development, Web Solutions, JAVA Applications, Game Development etc. In research projects: Data Mining, Big Data, Could Computing, Human Computer Interaction, Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, Internet of Things (IoT), Networking, Robotics, Bioinformatics, Software Engineering, Embedded Systems, Image Processing, Pattern Recognition etc.)
● Your preferred choice of Supervisors. You can give choice of maximum three (3) supervisors. Make sure your area of interest matched with your supervisors area of interest. A list of supervisors for current is published.

It is a 4 step registration process. Only one member from each team should fill up this form. Multiple submission are strictly not encouraged. \n\nFirstly, You have to put your team information (No of Students, Shift and Choice of Project/Internship). Secondly, you have to provide all the members Student ID, Name, DIU Email Address and Phone Number. Thirdly, you have to provide a tentative title and your area of interest. The \"Tentative Title\" should be understandable with the \"Area of Interest\". If you do not find your area in the list choose \"Others\" option and name the area. Finally, you have to provide three choices of your preferred Supervisor. It is not guaranteed that your first choice of supervisor will be assigned. Assigning supervisor is subject to the rules and regulations set by the project/internship committee.

First Step:
● Choose No of Students in your team. According to the rules, maximum 3 member teams are allowed. (If you want to make a team having 4 members you have to proceed with a "Formal Application to the Head of The Department" and have to fill up a different form which is available in CSE department. If you have an approved application (approved by Head of the Department), then you do not have to submit this registration.
● Choose your shift (Day or Evening). Day shift Students cannot merge a team with Evening Shift students and vice versa. Choose your choice (Project or Internship).
● Choosing "Project" will include development project and research project both. 

Second Step: Provide your team members Student ID, Name, DIU Email Address and Phone Number. All the fields are mandatory to be filled. 

Third Step: Provide a Tentative Title and Area of Interest. You can change your tentative title after assigning a supervisor consulting with him/her, But you cannot change your area of interest after assigning a supervisor to your team. 

Fourth Step: Provide Three (3) supervisors name and Initial. Select your preferred supervisor initial from the drop-down list. Choices are based on your priority.

\u25CF Only one member from each team should fill up this form. Multiple submission are strictly not encouraged. \n\u25CF It is not guaranteed that your first choice of supervisor will be assigned. Project/Internship Committee will assign a supervisor according to the rules and regulations advised by the honorable head of the department. \n\u25CF After assigning a supervisor, you cannot change your supervisor before Title Defense. Changing supervisor is not appreciated at all.
Internship is applicable for Evening student only (if any).
Student ID, Name, Email and Cell No. *
Write the student ID, Name, Email and Cell according to your group
Choose any two topic. For details information about these topics, see the Topic and Supervisor section.
I/We do hereby agree that, assigning supervisor according to the choice is not guaranteed always.*

Write the three different initial of the supervisors according to your choice! Only Initial with Capital letter, do not write full name. Note: It is not confirmed that you will get the supervisor if you give his/her initial in all three choice.
Check your internet connection\nand pull to refresh
